body_html: @ymodak @feihugis when is using dataset api without shuflle, tf will load all data into memory, then do own processing. If using shuffle, then tf will load buffer_size data into memory and do processing, but will shuffle the dataset. I want an interface to load buffer_size data into memory and do processing order by oder.
body_text: @ymodak @feihugis   when is using dataset api without shuflle, tf will load all data into memory, then do own processing. If using shuffle, then tf will load buffer_size data into memory and do processing, but will shuffle the dataset. I want an interface to load buffer_size data into memory and do processing order by oder.
body: @ymodak @feihugis   when is using dataset api without `shuflle`, tf will load all data into memory, then do own processing. If using `shuffle`, then tf will load `buffer_size` data into memory and do processing, but will shuffle the dataset. I want an interface to load `buffer_size` data into memory and do processing order by oder.
